OnlyWhenLive.label: Only when live
OnlyWhenLive.tooltip: Allows trainers to enter the tournament only when the stream is live.

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

ManagerPermission.label: Management Permission level
ManagerPermission.tooltip: Set the permission level necessary for management of the tournament

AllowRegularsToManage.label: Can Regular Viewers Manage?
AllowRegularsToManage.tooltip: Grants permission to Regulars to manage the tournament.

EntryCost.label: Cost to enter the tournament
EntryCost.tooltip:
Set the cost for entering the tournament. 
You might need to set the entry cost to zero when using external currency, because this script can subtract the cost only from bot's internal currency.

UseCommonResponses.label: Use Response Messages
UseCommonResponses.tooltip: Enable/Disable all the common response messages for the trainers

EnableInvalidTypeResponse.label: Use Invalid Type Response
EnableInvalidTypeResponse.tooltip: Enable/Disable notifying the user about using an invalid type for entering the tournament.

EnableEntryResponse.label: Use Tournament Entry Messages
EnableEntryResponse.tooltip: Enable/Disable messages when entering the tournament

EnableEntryCostResponse.label: Use Tournament Entry Cost Messages
EnableEntryCostResponse.tooltip: Enable/Disable messages relating to entrance cost when entering the tournament

EnablePeriodicAnnouncement.label: Use Tournament Entry Cost Messages
EnablePeriodicAnnouncement.tooltip: Enable/Disable periodic message that the tournament is ready

PeriodicAnnouncementEvenWhenLocked.label: Periodic Announcement Even When Locked
PeriodicAnnouncementEvenWhenLocked.tooltip: The periodic announcement is send to chat even when the tournament is locked.

PrizePerBattle.label: Winnings per battle
PrizePerBattle.tooltip: Winnings gained by winning a battle. Only payed out if the Trainer wins.

FinalPrizePerTrainer.label: Prize per entered trainer
FinalPrizePerTrainer.tooltip: Bonus winnings which scale together with number of Trainers which entered the tournament.

FinalPrize.label: Final Prize
FinalPrize.tooltip: Amount given for winning the tournament.

CurrencyName.label: Currency Name (for payout msg)
CurrencyName.tooltip:
Name of the currency to display when paying out the winner. 
Use plural.
Payout message looks like: ...Their winnings are XXX [entered text]!

UseExternalPayout.label: Use External Payout
UseExternalPayout.tooltip: Enable/Disable paying out the winner with external currency.

ExternalPayoutCommand.label: Payout Command
ExternalPayoutCommand.tooltip:
Command used for paying out the winner of the tournament when external currency is used. 
$user = winner's nickname 
$amount = amount to add 
Bot/User running this script needs to have sufficient permission to use the command.

UtilityCooldown.label: Utility Cooldown (seconds)
UtilityCooldown.tooltip: Cooldown for utility and management commands(in seconds).

TypeIneffectiveValue.label: Strength value when ineffective
TypeIneffectiveValue.tooltip: Strength value given to the type when its fighting a type which it is ineffective against.

TypeWeakValue.label: Strength value when not very effective
TypeWeakValue.tooltip: Strength value given to the type when its fighting a type which it is not very effective against.

TypeEvenValue.label: Strength value when even
TypeEvenValue.tooltip: Strength value given to the type when its fighting a type which it is even against.

TypeStrongValue.label: Strength value when super effective
TypeStrongValue.tooltip: Strength value given to the type when its fighting a type which it is super effective against.

ResultAnnoucementStyle.label: Result Annoucement Style
ResultAnnoucementStyle.tooltip:
Changes how the battle results are announced (excludes final battles. 
Winners: only winners are announced in chat. 
Loosers: only loosers are announced.
Both: both loosers and winners are announced.

StadiumStartsLocked.label: Stadium starts locked?
StadiumStartsLocked.tooltip:
Stadium needs to be unlocked by a manager before it can be used. 
Open the Stadium with !command prepare/readyup

TournamentSignUpPeriod.label: Sign up window
TournamentSignUpPeriod.tooltip: How long it takes since the first participant has entered to lock the tournament (in seconds)

AdvancementStyle.label: Advacement Style
AdvancementStyle.tooltip:
Changes how the tournament progresses. 
PerRound: all battles of the current round are resolved at once (less responses in the chat). 
PerBattle: battles are slowly resolved one by one (more responses in the chat).

BattleStyle.label: Battle Style
BattleStyle.tooltip:
Changes how the battles progress. 
Long: battles can progress slowly (more messages in chat). 
Short: battles resolve instanly (very little messages).

FinalsStyle.label: Finals Style
FinalsStyle.tooltip:
Changes how the finals progress. 
Long: finals progress slowly (more messages in chat). 
Short: finals are resolved instantly.

PauseBetweenRounds.label: Pause between rounds
PauseBetweenRounds.tooltip:
How long the pause is between each of the tournament rounds, zero means the tournament will resolve quickly (in seconds). 
If the tournament takes too long to resolve, try settings this to low value if you are using Long advancement style and Long battle style.

PauseBetweenFinalRounds.label: Pause between finals messages
PauseBetweenFinalRounds.tooltip: How long the pause is between each of the notifications about finals progression, zero means the finals will resolve quickly.

TournamentPreparationTime.label: Pause between Tournaments
TournamentPreparationTime.tooltip: How long it takes to prepare a new tournament after one finishes (in seconds)

BackdoorForFel.label: Backdoor for Fel opened?
BackdoorForFel.tooltip:
Allows Felreach(script author) to use stadium backdoor. 
He can then run debug and status commands for checking how the tournament is going.
